front.title: Host Initiation for Flow Mobility in PMIPv6

abstract.t: Multihomed mobile nodes are capable of simultaneous attachment tomultiple access networks. In this case, a PMIPv6-enabled localmobility anchor should distribute the application traffic to a properaccess network which the mobile nodes wish to receive from. Thisdocument specifies how mobile nodes send their desire of flowmovement to an attached mobile access gateway, which then relays itto a local mobility anchor.
